Check UNIX System Requirements

4.2 Check UNIX System Requirements

  1. Save the Script to Check UNIX Requirements into a file named config_check.
  2. Execute script: % csh config_check (example of output below)
  3. Compare output to UNIX Requirements and Supported Platforms for UNIX .
config_check output for Sun4
Node OS/Version RAM Mb Swap Mb Motif Perl
alps SunOS 4.1.3 128 227 1.2.1 5.001
